price: নিশ্চয় আল্লাহেই জীৱিকাদাতা, প্ৰবল শক্তিধৰ, মহাপৰাক্ৰমশালী।
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha huwa al-razāqu dhū al-quwati al-matīnu
